thread.title: Stock Market Returns to Calm After Epic Jump

author: Gunjan Banerji
title: Stock Market Returns to Calm After Epic Jump
text:
Wall Street’s fear gauge has been getting less scary by the week.
The Cboe Volatility Index, or VIX, closed below its 200-day moving average last Wednesday for the first time since January and has remained there since.
The VVIX, a measure of how volatile the VIX itself is, dipped under its average weeks ago. The VVIX, also known as “the VIX...
